content:
please visit https://crates.io/me and paste the API Token below

This is kind of poorly phrased imo.
I was waiting for half a minute for a token to appear in the command line to paste it into the browser, but it actually wants me to paste from the browser into the command line :sweat_smile:

please paste the api token found on https://crates.io/me below
is probably less ambiguous..

mini pr: <https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/8579>
let me know if you have better ideas
